customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice, natural looking
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a little color without looking like I was wearing makeup. This does the trick. It does have more coverage than I thought it would, but I just use a little less. And it doesn't make my skin break out, which is a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Beth F

customer_reviews.title: Lightest shade available is still way too dark
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe that the Ivory to Light 10 is the lightest shade available. It was at least 2 shades to dark for my skin tone. I usually am the lightest shade on the shelf for makeup. It's a shame because it's a moisturizer, with SPF, with Retinol, AND it being tinted sounds like a dream.....if you don't have porcelain toned skin.
customer_reviews.author: Brost78

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all in one face protection and coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect consitency for a summer light coverage makeup. Face lotion, sunscreen and color all in one!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Bross

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I put this on half of my face and started to get hives on the side of my face. There were three bumps that felt and looked like bug bites. I never had an allergic reaction to any makeup or skincare products like this. I am not allergic to retinol and have used many neutrogena products in the past including their anti wrinkle creams with no problems. I washed the product off and the hives went away within an hour. The product felt nice but smelled like clay. Coverage like any tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Stellar

customer_reviews.title: I love this product for daily use
customer_reviews.text: I had looked for this product in stores in my area and couldn't find it. I was delighted to see it in my amazon search. It is the perfect daily skincare product. It is easily applied,light,non-sticky, and protects against skin damage from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eckerich

customer_reviews.title: Good color correction, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to remind everyone, its not a foundation. Very light coverage, provides some what of a color correction for your foundation. Very hydrating, not too dewy looking. I really like this one. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to. I actually use it as my foundation. It doesn’t cover everything, but surprisingly isn’t bad for just a tinted moisturizer. Just a little concealer in the trouble spots and I’m good to go. It’s light weight, dries nice, and looks very natural still. Highly recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Randi VanHemert

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday
customer_reviews.text: This color is perfect for my olive skin tone. Light but enough spf and coverage for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: You can definitely smell the sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to replace my regular foundation for everyday use. The coverage is pretty mediocre. I had to also use concealer to cover up the natural redness in my face. I do appreciate the sunscreen in it though. I hadn't noticed any of the benefits from the retinol cream though. I wouldn't purchase this product again because I looking for a little bit more coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Collins

customer_reviews.title: very light weight
customer_reviews.text: i guess i got the right color because it matches perfectly, very light weight, dispenser top is a pump, coverage is light but that is ok for me, i feel like with regular use you would go thru a tube fairly quickly
customer_reviews.author: slim

customer_reviews.title: Ok not great
customer_reviews.text: Heavier cream than expected. Did not have option to choose color on order so just thought it was a neutral cream. When it came I was surprised the box said “neutral to tan” because I am a fair skinned blue eyed blonde. Color blends ok but still I feel a lighter shade option should have been offered. I use Neutrogena products all the time and this is the first time I have felt disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paula B

customer_reviews.title: I was suprised at how much I liked it
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth application, didn't pill up. Natural light coverage, nice matte, but not too matte finish. I have drier, mature skin, and this didn't seem to sink into my lines as much as other of these types of tinted moisturizers do. I did apply a bit of moisturizer first, if not, I think this might have been a bit drying, but it seemed to work out great. Lasted all day, and into the early evening, didn't oxidize, and didn't burn my eyes, which is a problem I have had with this line in the past. For the price, I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jill2dot0

customer_reviews.title: Great light coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Tan to neutral was perfect coverage for my sun tanned face for summer. I tend to freckle and have sun damage. The coverage blended, lightly not heavy, and gave a dewy finish to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tinted sunblock. It feels nice in my skin, does t have the funky smell that many sunblocks have and helps even my skin tone. I am in my fifties and done even need to use foundation anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Saz

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!!
customer_reviews.text: It is light coverage, but fantastic! I have oily skin and I didn't need powder! Not oily, not dry, its just right! Perfect color too, which is so hard to find. The light coverage is so great for natural days, and on full make up days I just use some concealer on my acne. Boom done. It's hard to find a natural make up that actually looks natural, and stays put! I am in love!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Have to use a lot and smells strongly of sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I like the small amount of tint, but it’s definitely very light coverage. It smells like sunscreen and you need to apply a fair amount to get your face. Overall I like it, but probably wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Pack

customer_reviews.title: Easy glow everyday
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I dont like wearing thick makeup or powder. This is perfect for everyday use. Its very lightweight and gives a little tint. It does not cover imperfections but still provides a nice glow and skin looks a little better than with nothing at all. plus it gives you protection from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Ampep

customer_reviews.title: Not very covering
customer_reviews.text: Not as covering as other tinted moisturizers. I found that it actually was darker on my skin and darkened more over time - rather than “lightening” like other reviews said. The texture was nice if you can get the right shade.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection and evens skin tone
customer_reviews.text: Got the fair to light and it blends in perfectly, it even worked on my very fair daughter. I usually go with light but this worked well for me. I'm in my 60's and love how easily this goes on and it has retinol. All in one for a fair price. Coverage is not great, just ok, but thats fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ninas house

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Very light weight. Glad its moisture as well as sunscreen with coverage. But lightly. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Leatherface
customer_reviews.text: Was nice for a couple days. Liked that it’s just mildly evened out my skin tone and didn’t get weird and caky in the wrinkles under my eyes. But after a couple days of use my skin turned incredibly dry, tight, itchy and flaky.
customer_reviews.author: Pastry chef

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it doesn’t “over” cover my skin. I have freckles and I don’t like to make it look like I caked on foundation. This is the only product I’ve found that fits my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I wear it when I go out to run errands, anywhere that I need to protect my skin but Not enough for foundation. And the color is perfect and I feel good protecting my skin against the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: So I just received this and couldn't wait to try it. And I love it. It goes on so smooth. And after applying my foundation and setting powder just makes a big difference no blotchiness at all. Only thing that I wish that were different would be the fragrance. It's not a very pleasant fragrance to me. Other than that I would definitely buy this again. And I have used several primers and I have to say this is my favorite so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a protected foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, and use it for my foundation too! The “R” in it helps with pimples, but none have been present since using. I’ll note that powder hasn’t been needed too much either. All skin types related: I’m a “T” zone type!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I'll always buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Yaay. I don't need to wear foundation in the morning now, (this is it) and if I'm in a rush and don't have time for my SPF no biggie because it has it in it. I HOPE they never stop making this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Only complaint is the texture.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’d give it a 4/5. I have oily skin so this isn’t really the product for me. The texture is watery like lotion which makes my face look even more oily. Other than that, I love it. It covers my redness and uneven complexion, very moisturizing, doesn’t smell bad, has ingredients that are good for you and the color was spot on. I recommend using this with a powder on top to reduce the oily look.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The only way this product would be better is if it had a higher spf. It blends perfectly, doesn’t make me shiny or greasy looking and it doesn’t get cakey. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product provides outstanding sun protection and moisturizing. I am seeking a tinted moisturizer, and this product does not provide the level of coverage that I have had with other tinted moisturizers and BB creams. I have noticed a difference in fine lines, though. I may not purchase this product again, but will consider other products in this line.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Magin

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Aging Perfector Tinted Facial Moisturizer and Retinol Treatment with Broad Spectrum SPF 20 Sunscreen with Titanium Dioxide, 20 Fair to Light, 1 fl. oz
product_meta.description:
Color:20 Fair To LightUse Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Aging Perfector Tinted Facial Moisturizer with SPF 20 sunscreen to help reduce the appearance of fine lines. This all-in-one daily moisturizer combines the anti-aging properties of retinol with an SPF 20 moisturizer to offer blendable sheer coverage that helps even tone and smooth skin's texture while protecting against skin-damaging sunrays. This tinted moisturizer is enriched with clinically proven retinol treatment as well as vitamins and antioxidants to fight the appearance of wrinkles even after you take it off. Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Aging Perfector SPF 20 works across skin tones for a natural, dewy finish with sheer coverage.

BRAND STORY
By Neutrogena
feature_bullets: 1-fluid ounce tube of Neutrogena Healthy Skin Anti-Aging Perfector All-in-One Tinted Facial Moisturizer with SPF 20 to help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
Offering blendable sheer coverage, the moisturizing tint helps even skin tone and smooths skin's texture
Formulated with clinically proven retinol as well as antioxidants and vitamins, it helps make skin appear younger-looking and healthier with a natural dewy finish
Suitable for daily use, the tint also contains titanium dioxide, and a broad spectrum SPF 20 sunscreen to protect skin from the sun's damaging UVA/UVB rays
To use, apply the moisturizing retinol treatment with fingers or a sponge all over face as part of your regular skincare and beauty routine for beautiful, younger-looking skin
